nodes.body:
{üíª Game Jam} [STLGameDev](https://stlgame.dev) is hosting the [Spooky Jam 2025](https://stlgame.dev/news/spooky-jam-2025/)!
October 16-30 with 4 free Work-up sessions and a Post-Jam Showcase at Maryville University! Sign up on [Itch.io](https://itch.io/jam/stlgamedev-spooky-jam-2025)

{!header} STLGameDev has had a busy month, from attending the [Chicago Indie Games Showcase](https://bsky.app/profile/stlgame.dev/post/3lygekcymdk2c) with hundreds of attendees to having a speed networking event for our [Spooky Jam](https://itch.io/jam/stlgamedev-spooky-jam-2025) starting on the 16th of October!

{üïπÔ∏è Game Jam Releases} _SamaraOpal_ released [Keep it Down, Turn it Up](https://samaraopal.itch.io/keep-it-down-turn-it-up) on itch.io as a part of the Brackeys 2025.2 Game Jam! Risk your social life on this party and fingers crossed the outcome is worth it!

{üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates} After finishing his Doom 2 megawad and deathmatch pack ([Operation: Reaper](https://mods.bethesda.net/en/doom_doomii/details/cf3f26a8-5a4a-4518-a0bc-d30b81d06538/Operation__Reaper)), _ludicrousda3ve_ put together a Doom + Doom 2 [mod development tutorial series](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2oqEiezllm79a7Rp2lg_eRyeD4PY1Op7)!

{üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates} _Kris Truitt_ has made the [boss entrances](https://www.tiktok.com/@mansionmillionmonsters/video/7545952970064596279) of his game, [Mansion of a Million Monsters](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3627210/), more dramatic! He also added a [water gun](https://www.tiktok.com/@mansionmillionmonsters/video/7546663157670874382), and has a [Kickstarter launching soon](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lkmkgames/mansion-of-a-million-monsters)!

{üïπÔ∏è Game Jam Releases} _Scarmez, Bluewit, Timconceivable_, and _HyphenPixel_ created [Mending Misfortunate Manor](https://pixel-bluewit.itch.io/mending-misfortune-manor) for the Gameboy Jam 13 'Unlucky'. In this adventure walking-sim, join Lucky on his latest house call. Explore the mysterious manor belonging to Ms. Fortune, complete the items on the repair list, then call it a day's work and finally go home.

{üéÆ Releases} _Prettycoolducks_ made [Dreams of a Ghost](https://prettycoolducks.itch.io/dreams-of-a-ghost) for their junior thesis at college! Follow the story of Mil, a young girl who‚Äôs lost touch with her childhood friend, Vin, and meets her in a dream.

{üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates} _Sam Coster_ worked up a [free art book](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_pSBTLUCvTpYRiIsZjmXV5lIcl44q5Xu/view) to go along with the final update to [Crashlands 2](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401730/Crashlands_2/)!

{üìö Resources} In light of Silksong's [negative Chinese reviews](https://www.thegamer.com/hollow-knight-silksong-negative-reviews-chinese-localisation/) for using a very poetic and ancient version of Chinese, Isabelle brought up the GDC Talk [Localization Shenanigans in the Chinese Speaking World](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1WeZ3X_HZ6U)

{üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates} _Wonderpond Games_ posted a [fall-themed art update](https://bsky.app/profile/wonderpondgames.bsky.social/post/3lzc7ebu6ps2h) of [Gelli Fields](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1965980/Gelli_Fields/)!

{üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates} [froog](https://bsky.app/profile/did:plc:ebnxdur2zb5jl72koxjg376c) gave _Tony Woljnar_'s game, Dribble 2, a [revamped logo](https://bsky.app/profile/tonywojnar.bsky.social/post/3ly4aejoybc2z)!

{üéÆ Releases} _Atomic Mills_ released [Bearplane](https://atomicmills.com/bearplane) with music by _Fat Bard_ for Steam, iOS, and Google Play! Take to the skies as a rocket-powered bear in Bearplane: a whimsical, action-packed adventure loosely inspired by the legendary tale of Wojtek the Bear.
{üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates} _Colorgrave_ has been posting [DevLogs on Youtube](https://bsky.app/profile/colorgrave.bsky.social/post/3lxki34qrck25), starting with _Looloopaa_!
{üì¢ News} [Bubsy 4D](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3237970/Bubsy_4D/), with music by _[Fat Bard](https://bsky.app/profile/fatbard.com/post/3lxcsb6yffs26)_, was announced!

{üì¢ News} Submissions are open until October 8th for GDC's 2026 Independent Games Festival! [Submit your indie game](https://gdconf.com/article/submissions-now-open-join-the-2026-independent-games-festival/) to be considered for to compete for awards in multiple categories.
{üßë‚Äçüíª Dev Updates} _Aaron Sumner_ has been working in PICO-8 on [Space Cowboy](https://bsky.app/profile/ruralocity.bsky.social/post/3lyqwf7xunp2e)!
{üé® Art} Xain Russell made a talking [pixel pngtuber](https://bsky.app/profile/xainrussell.bsky.social/post/3lzhqiikcp22y)!
{üé® Art} DoodleDupe remade their character Hacha in a [low-poly 3D style](https://x.com/doodle_dupe/status/1971389099618730388?s=46)!

events.title: Game Audio Feedback and Q&A feat. Fat Bard
events.description:
Fat Bard¬†will be doing a mini-workshop to assess the effectiveness of YOUR work. They are looking for 4 people to submit websites / portfolios to be looked-over live during their presentation. Submissions will be selected before the event to be assessed during the workshop.¬†
There will be a Q&A after the assessments, so you can pick their brains on whatever pressing questions you might have for them about their journey in the world of game audio and beyond!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/311170436
events.location: MAP St. Louis Montessori School - 3840 Washington Ave - St. Louis, MO, us

events.title: October GameDev Social!
events.description:
Come chat with fellow creators about making, playing, and admiring games! Talk about your game ideas and get inspired! Make friends and find collaborators for Spooky Jam, which starts on the 16th!

We will have a speed-networking activity around 8pm after everyone gets settled in. So be sure to arrive by then!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307236095
events.location: Dirty 20 Bar - 14051 Manchester Rd - Ballwin, MO, us

events.title: Spooky Jam 2025 Kick-Off Presentation
events.description:
Kick-off the Spooky Jam 2025 with a short Presentation on our Discord Server



https://discord.com/invite/mTMKpre/

events.title: Spooky Jam 2025
events.description:
Spooky Jam 2025!¬† A special Halloween game jam for the STLGameDev community!

https://stlgame.dev/news/spooky-jam-2025/

events.title: Spooky Jam Work-Up (Grand Glaize)
events.description:
Free work-up session for the Spooky Jam 2025!

Bring your laptop to work on your game in person with other Jammers!

This event is at the Grand Glaize Branch - Meeting Room 2
https://www.slcl.org/hours-and-locations/grand-glaize-branch
events.location: St. Louis County Library‚ÄìGrand Glaize Branch, 1010 Meramec Station Road, Manchester, MO 63021, USA

events.title: Spooky Jam 2025 Showcase Event
events.description:
Bring your finished game to show-off and hangout with other Jammers in the Post-Jam Showcase event!

Costumes Encouraged!
events.location: Maryville University - Design & Visual Art Building, Room 103/104 - 611 Maryville University Dr, St. Louis, MO 63141, USA
